title: SLPP MPs to meet President on Saturday (14)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Podu Jana Peramuna (SLPP) Parliamentary Group is scheduled to meet with President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the President’s House on Saturday (14) at 9 AM.
This will be the first meeting of Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna MPs with the President after Mahinda Rajapaksa resigned from the post of Prime Minister.
Appeal Court issues interim order on Sri Lanka Rugby suspension
